entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
